source: So if we're serious about helping black boys and other children to read when it's not required, we need to incorporate relevant male reading models into early literacy and exchange some of the children's books that adults love so much for funny, silly or even gross books, like "Gross Greg".

source: And for a moment I was wondering, are we going to live in order to see real change happening on the ground, a change that does not come through foreign intervention, through the misery of occupation, through nations invading our land and deepening the sense of inferiority sometimes?

source: Moonlighting as a stand-up comedian for the past eight years, I understand the importance of cultural competency, which I define as the ability to translate what you want someone else to know or be able to do into communication or experiences that they find relevant and engaging.

source: And what's interesting to me is that the teams that usually win are not the ones with the most experienced team members, but the ones with members who are open to learn, who are open to unlearn and who are open to helping each other navigate through the changing circumstances.

source: Decisively my other foot sets itself onto the cable.
reference: Decidido, meu outro pé se coloca sobre o cabo.
llama2:7b: Decisivamente meu outro pé estaciona-se sobre o cabo..

source: And we get sucked into that faster than anything.
reference: E caímos nessa mais rápido que qualquer outra coisa.
llama2:7b: E e nós nos precipitamos para o que é mais rápido do que qualquer outra coisa...

source: And early in the morning, I went into the ward.
reference: E de manhã cedo, entrei na enfermaria.
llama2:7b: Early in the morning, eu entrou na sala de aguardados.

source: There was no opponent directly across from you.
reference: Não havia um oponente diretamente contra você.
llama2:7b: Não havia nenhum adversário diretamente em frente de você.

source: And we're going to go all across the country.
reference: E prosseguiremos em todo o país.
llama2:7b: E e vamos ir de um lado para o outro pela nossa pátria.

source: That DNA is passed down through our mothers.
reference: Esse DNA nos é transmitido por meio de nossas mães.
llama2:7b: Essa DNA é transmitida através de nossas mães

source: And here's some music translated into color.
reference: E aqui estão algumas músicas traduzidas em cores.
llama2:7b: E e aqui é música traduzida em cores..

source: They would literally walk across the street.
reference: Literalmente atravessavam a rua, para outra calçada.
llama2:7b: Eles literalmente iriam atravessar a rua

source: That reaches 21 kilometers into the sky.
reference: Isso atinge 21 quilômetros até o céu.
llama2:7b: Essa atinge 21 quilômetros do céu acima de si.

source: And so that's just programmed into you.
reference: Então isso é simplesmente programado em você.
llama2:7b: E assim é que está programado em você...

source: And the light goes through that hole.
reference: E a luz passa através daquele orifício.
llama2:7b: E e a luz atravessa esse buraco.

reference: Mas então se tornam em pisões.
